name: Squarently
description:
Squarently is a sandbox platformer made in GameMaker: Studio that involves you jumping, dashing, climbing and exploring! Inspired by many other sandbox platformers, recent or not, this game focuses on fun more than anything!

________________________________________

Note: This game is still in extremely early stages and anything can change in development at any time. Nothing currently shown is final.

________________________________________

Features:

  • Campaign and sandbox exploration!
  • Online and local multiplayer!
  • Controller support!
  • A selection of gamemodes for you to try out with your friends!
  • A custom soundtrack!
  • And even more!

________________________________________

You can join our Discord server here! This is a server that has dedicated sections for every game we're making, including this one!
